title: Animated single-page developer portfolio (9+ years, 100+ websites, multi-service)

requirements.summary: Build a single-page portfolio with sticky navigation and required sections (Hero, Timeline, Work/Projects, Services, Contact).
acceptanceCriteria: A visitor can reach all required sections via a top navigation (sticky or in-page anchors).
All section headings and body text are in English.

Content explicitly includes: “9+ years of experience”, “100+ websites”, and mentions websites across schools/real estate/ecommerce/others, plus apps across fintech/cryptocurrency/real-estate/e-commerce/travel, plus digital marketing/SEO/graphic designing.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell that renders a single-page layout and composes the required sections (Hero/Intro, Timeline, Work/Projects, Services, Contact) with in-page anchor IDs for navigation.

Implement a sticky top navigation with in-page anchor links to each required section. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button / NavigationMenu if available) for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Hero/Intro section content in English including explicit text “9+ years of experience” and “100+ websites”, plus a primary CTA that scrolls to Contact.
Create the 9+ years journey section wrapper with milestone content structure (years/roles/highlights) and an anchor ID for navigation.

Create the Work/Projects section wrapper with copy that mentions websites across schools/real estate/ecommerce/others and apps across fintech/cryptocurrency/real-estate/e-commerce/travel, plus an anchor ID for navigation.
Create the Services section wrapper and layout area for service cards and CTA-to-contact.
Create the Contact/CTA section wrapper containing the contact form UI and optional contact method placeholders (email/LinkedIn), with an anchor ID for navigation.
Ensure the App component is the primary render target and that global styles load correctly for the single-page portfolio.

requirements.summary: Implement scroll-revealed, performant timeline animations with a reduced-motion mode (prefers-reduced-motion).
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline milestones animate in as the user scrolls (no auto-playing-only animation).
Animations are smooth and performant on modern desktop and mobile browsers.
Provide a user-accessible reduced-motion mode (respect prefers-reduced-motion) that disables or simplifies motion effects.

file_operations.description: Add a small hook to detect prefers-reduced-motion and expose a boolean to simplify/disable motion effects.
Implement an IntersectionObserver-based scroll reveal helper for timeline milestones (fade/slide) designed for performance and mobile compatibility.
Add a lightweight progress indicator for the timeline section that updates based on scroll position and respects reduced-motion mode.
Wire milestone items to scroll-reveal behavior and include decorative/parallax accents guarded by reduced-motion checks. Reference the timeline accent image via the generated static asset file.
Define animation utility classes (e.g., reveal base/active states) and include a prefers-reduced-motion media rule that disables/transitions to minimal effects for all portfolio animations.

requirements.summary: Create a filterable/tabbed Work/Projects UI showing category-based highlights for Websites and Apps with short descriptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Websites and Apps are each presented with categories matching the user’s list.
UI supports switching between categories (tabs, segmented control, or filters).
Each category contains at least a short English description and representative highlights (non-exhaustive).

file_operations.description: Implement a tabbed UI for switching between Websites and Apps and their categories. Use the shadcn-ui Tabs component (and related UI primitives if needed) to provide accessible tab behavior; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Populate the Work/Projects section with the required categories: Websites (Schools, Real Estate, E-commerce, Other) and Apps (Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Real Estate, E-commerce, Travel), each with short English descriptions and non-exhaustive representative highlights; render consistent icons from generated assets.

Create a small helper component to render specific icons from the generated sprite/sets (as static images) with consistent sizing/alignment across Work and Services. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing (if pairing with shadcn-ui layout primitives).

requirements.summary: Add a Services section with five service cards and a prominent CTA to the Contact section.
acceptanceCriteria: Services list includes all five areas: web dev, app dev, digital marketing, SEO, graphic design.
Each service is represented as a consistent card with title + short English description.
There is a prominent CTA button that scrolls/navigates to the contact section.

file_operations.description: Implement a consistent service-card grid for: Web development, App development, Digital marketing, SEO, Graphic design. Use shadcn-ui Card and Button components for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Services section to render the service cards, include 'one stop solution' positioning copy in English, and add a primary CTA that scrolls to the Contact section anchor.

requirements.summary: Implement a contact section with a simple validated form, plus local-only success/failure UI states and optional contact placeholders.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields: name, email, message, with basic client-side validation.
Submitting the form shows a clear success/failure state in the UI (mock/local-only is acceptable).
No third-party auth, email service, or external integrations are required to use the site.

file_operations.description: Create a local-only contact form with fields (name, email, message), basic client-side validation, and a submit handler that shows success/failure UI states without external integrations. Use shadcn-ui Input, Textarea, Button, and Alert (or similar) for form controls and feedback; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the ContactForm and add optional contact method placeholders (e.g., email/LinkedIn) in a clean layout suitable for a portfolio.

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent premium theme (typography/spacing/colors) with responsive layout and a non-blue/purple-dominant palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all sections (headings, buttons, cards, background accents).
Color palette is not dominated by blue+purple.
Layout is responsive and looks polished on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

file_operations.description: Establish global theme tokens (CSS variables for background/foreground/primary/accent), typography defaults, and spacing rhythm. Choose a restrained palette (e.g., charcoal/sand with warm copper/olive accents) that avoids a blue+purple dominant scheme.

Extend Tailwind theme as needed to support the portfolio’s typography scale, spacing, and any custom animations/utilities used across sections while keeping the palette aligned with the non-blue/purple-dominant theme.

Create a layout wrapper that standardizes section spacing, max widths, and consistent background accents across the page; use shadcn-ui primitives where helpful for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wrap the page in PortfolioLayout to ensure consistent typography, spacing, and responsive composition across all sections.

requirements.summary: Add and reference generated static images (hero background, icons sets, timeline accent) from the frontend public assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero section uses the generated hero image as a prominent visual element.
Category/service visuals use the generated icons consistently (size, style, alignment).

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero background illustration as a static public asset at the exact required path.
Add the generated minimal line-icon set (School, Real Estate, E-commerce, Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Travel) as a static public asset at the exact required path.
Add the generated minimal line-icon set (Digital Marketing, SEO, Graphic Design, Web Development, App Development) as a static public asset at the exact required path.
Add the generated timeline decorative illustration element as a static public asset at the exact required path.
Reference and render the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as a prominent visual element within the hero section (no backend proxying).
Reference and render the timeline accent image from frontend/public/assets/generated/timeline-accent.dim_1200x2400.png as a decorative element aligned with the timeline.
Reference icons consistently from frontend/public/assets/generated/icons-set.dim_1024x1024.png for the Work/Projects categories (size, style, alignment).
Reference icons consistently from frontend/public/assets/generated/services-icons.dim_1024x1024.png for all service cards (size, style, alignment).
